titleStmt.title: A proclamation by His Excellency Robert Earle of Essex, &c. Captaine Generall of the army imployed for the defence of the Protestant religion, King, Parliament, and kingdome. Together with a letter from a gentleman of quality residing in the army, concerning the advancement of the army towards Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.

titleStmt.title: A proclamation by His Excellency Robert Earle of Essex, &c. Captaine Generall of the army imployed for the defence of the Protestant religion, King, Parliament, and kingdome. Together with a letter from a gentleman of quality residing in the army, concerning the advancement of the army towards Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.
Gentleman of quality residing in the Army.

notesStmt.note: This proclamation to prevent plundering is dated 26 May, 1644.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Gentleman of quality residing in the Army.
